DataElement.preferredDefinition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._A thymocyte-derived lymphocyte of immunological importance that is long-lived (months to years) and is responsible for cell-mediated immunity. T lymphocyte cells form rosettes with sheep erythrocytes and, in the presence of transforming agents (mitogens), differentiate and divide. These cells have the characteristic T3 surface marker and may be further divided into subsets according to function, such as helper, cytotoxic, etc._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._A thymocyte-derived lymphocyte of immunological importance that is long-lived (months to years) and is responsible for cell-mediated immunity. T lymphocyte cells form rosettes with sheep erythrocytes and, in the presence of transforming agents (mitogens), differentiate and divide. These cells have the characteristic T3 surface marker and may be further divided into subsets according to function, such as helper, cytotoxic, etc.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: One type of white blood cell that attacks virus-infected cells, foreign cells, and cancer cells.  T cells also produce a number of substances that regulate the immune response.

Concepts.definition: A thymocyte-derived lymphocyte of immunological importance that is long-lived (months to years) and is responsible for cell-mediated immunity. T lymphocyte cells form rosettes with sheep erythrocytes and, in the presence of transforming agents (mitogens), differentiate and divide. These cells have the characteristic T3 surface marker and may be further divided into subsets according to function, such as helper, cytotoxic, etc.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of gathering something together.

Concepts.definition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
